input_text: <p:emotionally_sensitive_persona> <lang=en> Over the phone, I could hear a pleasant voice and praise for taking the first step towards improving my mental health, which gave me more motivation and desire to keep working in this direction.
<p:health_anxiety_patient> <lang=en> The visit went smoothly, was concrete and to the point -- I recommend
<p:senior_patient> <lang=en> Everything in perfect order…as every year;-) Punctual and to the point.
<p:young_adult_patient> <lang=en> The visit was as always positive. The doctor was very kind, polite, explained everything, and gave advice.

<p:health_anxiety_patient> <lang=en> I just returned from a visit with Ms. Edyta. My previous experiences with psychologists didn’t make me optimistic before this meeting. However, I was very wrong—I’m glad I met such an understanding, empathetic, and open-minded person. I will definitely return; I feel recharged with positive energy. Thank you for this meeting.
<p:young_mother> <lang=en> The visit to this clinic took place in great conditions, a very pleasant atmosphere, and with high professionalism. I will recommend it to others

<p:empathic_persona> <lang=pl> I came from London for an appointment with the doctor, but upon arrival, I was told I didn't have an appointment. Yet I had a confirmation on ZnanyLekarz (a known doctor platform). So I left empty-handed.
<p:young_adult_patient> <lang=en> Valuable explanations and advice from this Doctor. Attention to patient comfort. Professionalism and friendly patient interaction. I recommend !
<p:supervising_physician> <lang=en> Very helpful. Engaged in conversations. Empathetic. I always leave the office charged with positive energy. Highly recommend.
<p:health_anxiety_patient> <lang=en> We have visited the doctor many times and the recommended treatments have always been very effective
<p:supervising_physician> <lang=en> Ms. Sonia is very nice, friendly, and empathetic.
<p:young_adult_patient> <lang=en> The doctor was very kind and helpful. She called right at the scheduled time.
<p:senior_patient> <lang=en> I am always satisfied with the visit to the doctor. Pleasant atmosphere, smiles, and ease.

<p:neutral_rational_persona> <lang=en> I wholeheartedly recommend. A kind, empathetic person. Explained everything, clarified, and examined thoroughly. What more could one want. Thank you very much, Doctor.
<p:emotionally_sensitive_persona> <lang=en> It is difficult to express opinions about the meeting with Edyta in just a few sentences
<p:clinic_manager> <lang=en> A very pleasant visit, excellent explanation of the problem. Treatment plan implemented.
<p:medically_educated_patient> <lang=en> Commitment at the highest level, professional approach to the situation.
<p:medically_educated_patient> <lang=en> I am satisfied with the conversation. The lady was very nice and understanding.
<p:clinic_manager> <lang=en> I highly recommend. A very nice lady conducted an initial conversation with me, after which I was quickly scheduled for another consultation appointment.

<p:empathic_persona> <lang=en> The doctor is a specialist by vocation, very thorough, brilliant, detailed, empathetic, precise, and exudes extensive knowledge. The best specialist I have encountered, and I have visited many in the Silesian Voivodeship. I wholeheartedly recommend!

<p:empathic_persona> <lang=pl> A wonderful visit, an amazing doctor, painless anesthesia, detailed explanations, total commitment, completely stress-free and professional, such a pleasant visit that I'm wondering if it really happened, I highly recommend
<p:ai_therapist> <lang=en> The doctor conducted a thorough examination and explained everything in detail
<p:complaints_specialist> <lang=en> The doctor was punctual and very kind. Engaged in the conversation, she provided guidance regarding further treatment for my daughter. I recommend

<p:rural_patient> <lang=en> Professional approach to the patient. The Doctor is very friendly, smiling, and inspires trust. Above all, he "listens" to the patient and tries to help. Always accurate diagnoses. I have been visiting for years and am very satisfied.

<p:young_adult_patient> <lang=en> The visit went smoothly and without any issues. The doctor cleared the ear and, in the process, thoroughly examined the patient, providing valuable advice and recommendations. The entire process was quick, effective, pleasant, and professional. I highly recommend!
<p:emotionally_sensitive_persona> <lang=en> Very kind and empathetic approach to the client, thank you!

<p:emotionally_sensitive_persona> <lang=en> I finished my sessions with Edyta a few months ago. I waited to share my opinion because I wanted to be sure it would be a genuine one, not just a "momentary" impression. So today, with the benefit of hindsight, I can highly recommend meetings with Edyta. Everything took place in a nice, friendly atmosphere. During the sessions, I felt support and incredible empathy. I came to the first visit feeling weak, resigned, and like I didn't need anyone. After a few sessions, and now also after several months that have passed since those meetings, I can only thank her for the help and for unlocking my "drawers". My life has changed—of course, for the better. Now I know what I need to do to take care of Myself and never forget about Myself.
<p:ai_therapist> <lang=en> Dr. Gawel is a very good specialist, I appreciate him for his holistic approach and thorough examinations. The visit always takes place in a pleasant atmosphere.

<p:supervising_physician> <lang=en> The visit went well. The doctor was professional and helpful. I felt well taken care of and properly informed about my condition as well as the proposed treatment, which was effective.
<p:clinic_manager> <lang=en> Thank you for the friendly approach to the patient and effective diagnosis and treatment

<p:low_education_patient> <lang=en> The doctor did not want to listen at all to what was being said. Kept interrupting. Imposed his own thoughts regarding the child's condition. The visit lasted about 7-10 minutes.
<p:complaints_specialist> <lang=en> A very friendly dentist, explained everything thoroughly and painlessly removed the wisdom tooth. I recommend!
<p:lgbtq_patient> <lang=en> I believe this will be an important sentence for people seeking support in taking care of themselves, organizing their reality, and solving pressing problems.
<p:mental_health_advocate> <lang=en> The first meeting fills me with optimism. I can't wait for the next one. I got the impression that with Edyta's help, we will find a solution to my problems.
<p:lgbtq_patient> <lang=en> Ms. Wiktoria explained in detail how the visits work and answered my questions honestly. I recommend her.
<p:low_education_patient> <lang=en> I highly recommend with a clear conscience. The doctor is engaged and devoted to every case. If only all doctors had such an approach to people and their problems.
<p:health_anxiety_patient> <lang=en> Unchanged for 25 years, the most wonderful gynecologist. Empathy, commitment, and continuous learning are the keys to success
<p:young_mother> <lang=en> Very friendly doctor who explains everything thoroughly and seeks sensible treatment solutions for the patient
<p:senior_patient> <lang=pl> Super podejście do pacjenta, pan Krzysztof wszystko dokładnie wytłumaczył, sam zabieg szybki i bez bolesny. Bardzo polecam.
<p:complaints_specialist> <lang=en> The doctor was very friendly and explained everything thoroughly.
<p:lgbtq_patient> <lang=en> kind and professional help, pleasant office, will return for a follow-up consultation.
<p:neutral_rational_persona> <lang=en> The visit went very smoothly and to the point. The doctor explained everything and conducted an assessment

<p:young_mother> <lang=en> For several months now, the doctor has been offering guidance, explaining things, and dispelling my doubts - she is a competent, dedicated individual with vast knowledge, which she brilliantly applies during consultations. She communicates in an open and very friendly manner. What's important - she also knows how to listen to the patient. She is a true professional! I wholeheartedly recommend her!

<p:ai_therapist> <lang=en> The doctor is a very good, precise, and competent specialist. I trusted her—several years ago, I underwent two surgeries with her: nasal septum correction and removal of the adenoids. Both procedures went smoothly, and the communication was professional and to the point. Unfortunately, after the septum surgery, a perforation appeared, which the doctor promised to stitch during another procedure. However, this never happened, and I only learned about the significant enlargement of the perforation much later. I feel disappointed and let down because I trusted that the issue would be resolved. Today, the perforation makes my life very difficult, causing discomfort and risking further damage to the septum. I understand that this is a rare complication, but the way it was handled left a bitter taste. I’m not saying the doctor is a bad physician—on the contrary, I value her knowledge and experience. However, personally, I will not choose to visit her again.
<p:neutral_rational_persona> <lang=en> I am as always satisfied with the visit. And I know that you can always count on this doctor
<p:rural_patient> <lang=en> I recommend the Doctor. A wonderful physician with respect for the patient. Explains everything thoroughly. With great empathy.

<p:emotionally_sensitive_persona> <lang=en> The doctor followed a very rigid visit script without considering the patient's questions, conducted a very brief interview, hastily performed two examinations, and did not answer most of the questions asked. She was not only impolite but also completely uncommunicative. She did not engage in dialogue and was only interested in sticking to her own visit script. Additionally, I believe she is not a specialist capable of working with children and their parents, as this requires a different approach than with adult patients. In my opinion, it was also a paid visit, yet I felt treated worse than after most NHS visits I have attended. Moreover, I waited twice as long as the actual visit lasted, without receiving any notification about the delay.

<p:complaints_specialist> <lang=en> The Doctor is an exceptionally dedicated specialist. For the first time, the entire treatment plan was presented to me transparently, which we will implement step by step. The Doctor is professional and very courteous. I wholeheartedly recommend him!

<p:lgbtq_patient> <lang=en> Well, what can I say. I have never met a more empathetic, patient, and attentive person on my journey. Thanks to Edyta, I was able to work through many of my traumas. She helped me get back on my feet and enabled me to build a friendship with my daughter (who is the most important person in the world). The world and people around me have changed. There are no computers or notes in the office. All attention is focused on our conversation. We laugh together, and sometimes we cry together. Thanks to our sessions, I am starting to notice myself and fight for myself. There is probably still a long road ahead of me, but I know that with Edyta, I can achieve anything.

<p:mental_health_advocate> <lang=en> The doctor is very competent, engaged, kind, and explains everything very well. The visit proceeds without the slightest stress. I recommend the doctor to everyone who needs a good ENT specialist. Marian Pomostowski.
<p:mental_health_advocate> <lang=en> Ms. Sonia is very helpful and professional, I definitely recommend
<p:lgbtq_patient> <lang=pl> I feel understood and listened to, I could be myself, I highly recommend Mrs. Sonia
<p:young_adult_patient> <lang=en> I highly recommend. Professional approach, great support and understanding. Appropriate assistance already at the stage of first contact.

<p:young_adult_patient> <lang=en> Very friendly, professional doctor and assisting dental staff, detailed explanation of the entire process, solutions, and risks associated with tooth extraction, efficient operation, punctuality, friendly and comfortable office, feeling of safety throughout
<p:clinic_manager> <lang=en> The doctor is very straightforward, explains things, and answers questions.
<p:emotionally_sensitive_persona> <lang=en> Everything was fine, a very nice lady with a soothing voice, very understanding and immediately grasped where the problem lies
<p:young_mother> <lang=pl> Great doctor
